ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And the mountains will be crushed, blown to bits.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And the mountains will be powdered to dust,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And the mountains shall be made to crumble with (an awful) crumbling,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And the hills are ground to powder
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and the mountains are totally shattered and crumble to pieces
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And the mountains are crumbled, crumbled.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and the mountains are shattered into bits
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And the mountains shall be crumbled to atoms,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And the mountains will be powdered to dust.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And the mountains are crushed and crumbled.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And the mountains are broken down, crumbling
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [56:5] and the mountains are pulverised to [tiny] pieces,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And the hills are ground to powder) and it is also said: and the hills are made to move like the passing of the clouds; and it is also said that this means: when the hills are uprooted from their spots. 639
